lead_paragraph: A teacher found the weapon, loaded with four rounds, in the boy’s backpack on Friday morning, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Boy, 8, Brings Loaded Pistol Into an Elementary School in Brooklyn
headline.main: Boy, 8, Brings Loaded Pistol to Brooklyn Public School

snippet: A teacher found the weapon, loaded with four rounds, in the boy’s backpack on Friday morning, the police said.
